verses.text: \w Now|strong="H4428"\w* \w these|strong="H4428"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w province|strong="H4082"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1473"\w* \w carried|strong="H1540"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Babylon \w by|strong="H5892"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w its|strong="H7725"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w They|strong="H1540"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w each|strong="H4082"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* own \w town|strong="H5892"\w*,

\w accompanied|strong="H5973"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w*, \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, \w Nehemiah|strong="H5166"\w*, \w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w*, \w Reelaiah|strong="H7480"\w*, \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*, \w Bilshan|strong="H1114"\w*, \w Mispar|strong="H4558"\w*, Bigvai, \w Rehum|strong="H7348"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Baanah|strong="H1196"\w*.\f + \fr 2:2 \ft Parallel text at Nehemiah 7:7 accompanied by Zerubbabel, Jeshua, Nehemiah, Azariah, Raamiah, Nahamani, Mordecai, Bilshan, Mispereth, Bigvai, Nehum, and Baanah\f* \w This|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w count|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H4557"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H4557"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:
the descendants of Parosh, 2,172;
the descendants of Shephatiah, 372;
the descendants of Arah, 775;
the descendants of Pahath-moab (through the line of Jeshua and Joab), 2,812;
the descendants of Elam, 1,254;
the descendants of Zattu, 945;
the descendants of Zaccai, 760;
the descendants of Bani,\f + \fr 2:10 \ft Bani is a variant of Binnui; see Nehemiah 7:15.\f* 642;
the descendants of Bebai, 623;
the descendants of Azgad, 1,222;
the descendants of Adonikam, 666;
the descendants of Bigvai, 2,056;
the descendants of Adin, 454;
the descendants of Ater (through Hezekiah), 98;
the descendants of Bezai, 323;
the descendants of Jorah,\f + \fr 2:18 \ft Jorah is a variant of Hariph; see Nehemiah 7:24.\f* 112;
the descendants of Hashum, 223;
the descendants of Gibbar,\f + \fr 2:20 \ft Gibbar is a variant of Gibeon; see Nehemiah 7:25.\f* 95;
the men \f + \fr 2:21 \ft Literally the sons; here and in verses 25, 26, 33, and 34\f* of Bethlehem, 123;
the men of Netophah, 56;
the men of Anathoth, 128;
the descendants of Azmaveth,\f + \fr 2:24 \ft Azmaveth is a variant of Beth-azmaveth; see Nehemiah 7:28.\f* 42;
the men of Kiriath-jearim,\f + \fr 2:25 \ft LXX (see also Nehemiah 7:29); Hebrew Kiriath-arim\f* Chephirah, and Beeroth, 743;
the men of Ramah and Geba, 621;
the men of Michmash, 122;
the men of Bethel and Ai, 223;
the descendants of Nebo, 52;
the descendants of Magbish, 156;
the descendants of the other Elam,\f + \fr 2:31 \ft Or of West Elam\f* 1,254;
the descendants of Harim, 320;
the men of Lod, Hadid, and Ono, 725;
the men of Jericho, 345;
and the descendants of Senaah, 3,630.
\w The|strong="H3548"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*: The descendants of Jedaiah (through the house of Jeshua), 973;
the descendants of Immer, 1,052;
the descendants of Pashhur, 1,247;
and the descendants of Harim, 1,017.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*: the descendants of Jeshua and Kadmiel (through the line of Hodaviah \f + \fr 2:40 \ft Hodaviah is a variant of Hodevah; see Nehemiah 7:43.\f*), 74.
\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*: the descendants of Asaph, 128.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w gatekeepers|strong="H7778"\w*: the descendants of Shallum, the descendants of Ater, the descendants of Talmon, the descendants of Akkub, the descendants of Hatita, and the descendants of Shobai, 139 in all.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w temple|strong="H5411"\w* \w servants|strong="H5411"\w*:\f + \fr 2:43 \ft Hebrew The Nethinim; also in verses 58 and 70\f* the descendants of Ziha, the descendants of Hasupha, the descendants of Tabbaoth,
the descendants of Keros, the descendants of Siaha,\f + \fr 2:44 \ft Siaha is a variant of Sia; see Nehemiah 7:47.\f* the descendants of Padon,
the descendants of Lebanah, the descendants of Hagabah, the descendants of Akkub,
the descendants of Hagab, the descendants of Shalmai,\f + \fr 2:46 \ft Alternate MT reading (see also Nehemiah 7:48); the other alternate reads Shamlai\f* the descendants of Hanan,
the descendants of Giddel, the descendants of Gahar, the descendants of Reaiah,
the descendants of Rezin, the descendants of Nekoda, the descendants of Gazzam,
the descendants of Uzza, the descendants of Paseah, the descendants of Besai,
the descendants of Asnah, the descendants of Meunim, the descendants of Nephusim,\f + \fr 2:50 \ft Nephusim is a variant of Nephushesim; see Nehemiah 7:52.\f*
the descendants of Bakbuk, the descendants of Hakupha, the descendants of Harhur,
the descendants of Bazluth,\f + \fr 2:52 \ft Bazluth is a variant of Bazlith; see Nehemiah 7:54.\f* the descendants of Mehida, the descendants of Harsha,
the descendants of Barkos, the descendants of Sisera, the descendants of Temah,
the descendants of Neziah, and the descendants of Hatipha.

\w The|strong="H5650"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5650"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*: the descendants of Sotai, the descendants of Sophereth, the descendants of Peruda,\f + \fr 2:55 \ft Peruda is a variant of Perida; see Nehemiah 7:57.\f*
the descendants of Jaala, the descendants of Darkon, the descendants of Giddel,
the descendants of Shephatiah, the descendants of Hattil, the descendants of Pochereth-hazzebaim, and the descendants of Ami.\f + \fr 2:57 \ft Ami is a variant of Amon; see Nehemiah 7:59.\f*
The temple servants and descendants of the servants of Solomon numbered 392 in all.

\w The|strong="H5927"\w* following \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w Tel-melah|strong="H8528"\w*, \w Tel-harsha|strong="H8521"\w*, \w Cherub|strong="H3743"\w*, Addan,\f + \fr 2:59 \ft Addan is a variant of Addon; see Nehemiah 7:61.\f* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* Immer, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* prove \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w descended|strong="H2233"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:
the descendants of Delaiah, the descendants of Tobiah, and the descendants of Nekoda, 652 in all.

And from among the priests: the descendants of Hobaiah, the descendants of Hakkoz, and the descendants of Barzillai (who had married a daughter of Barzillai the Gileadite and was called by their name).
These men searched for their family records, but they could not find them and so were excluded from the priesthood as unclean.
The governor ordered them not to eat the most holy things until there was a priest to consult the Urim and Thummim.\f + \fr 2:63 \ft Literally Lights and Perfections\f*
\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w numbered|strong="H3967"\w* 42,360,

\w in|strong="H5650"\w* addition \w to|strong="H5650"\w* their 7,337 \w menservants|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* maidservants, \w as|strong="H5650"\w* well \w as|strong="H5650"\w* their 200 \w male|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* female \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*.
They had 736 \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, 245 \w mules|strong="H6505"\w*,
435 \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* 6,720 \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w*. Offerings by the Exiles (Exodus 38:21–31; Nehemiah 7:70–73)

\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* arrived \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, some \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w* gave \w freewill|strong="H5068"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* rebuild \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* original site.

\w According|strong="H3701"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w ability|strong="H3581"\w*, \w they|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* treasury \w for|strong="H3701"\w* \w this|strong="H5414"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* 61,000 darics \w of|strong="H3548"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*,\f + \fr 2:69 \ft Or 61,000 gold drachmas; that is, approximately 1,129.7 pounds or 512.4 kilograms of gold coins\f* 5,000 \w minas|strong="H4488"\w* \w of|strong="H3548"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*,\f + \fr 2:69 \ft 5,000 minas is approximately 3.14 tons or 2.85 metric tons of silver.\f* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* 100 \w priestly|strong="H3548"\w* \w garments|strong="H3801"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gatekeepers|strong="H7778"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w temple|strong="H5411"\w* \w servants|strong="H5411"\w*, along \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w settled|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H3548"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w*; \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \f + \fr 2:70 \ft Or all Israel\f* \w settled|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w*.
